content:
Copying @May Terry's note from the PCDE track:
Here’s the agenda for the upcoming Jan 2021 FHIR Connectathon PCDE track: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=97459186#id-202101DaVinciHRex/CDex/PCDEHealthRecord,ClinicalData,&PayerCoverageDecisionExchange-Agenda

We’ll have the designated Connectathon track Zoom meeting up throughout the entire Connectathon so participants and observers can join at any time in case you need to test your implementations or ask questions about the IG or related topics. Interim communications can be made on this HRex/CDex Zulip channel for those whose time is split among multiple Connectathon tracks.

Joe, Lloyd, and I will be monitoring this Zulip channel between now and the Connectathon so feel free to reach out if you need support.

An additional session has been scheduled tomorrow from 10-11:30 Eastern. Topic: Non-happy path FHIR implementation
We'll be going through some of the challenges of producing and consuming FHIR data. Officially a joint between CDex and PDex, but others are welcome to join. Details here: https://whova.com/portal/webapp/hlsfh_202109/Agenda/1941394
Documentation from our morning's discussion is here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/DVP/Non-happy+path+considerations
Connectathon Session Starting now, join us for a Da Vinci Clinical Data Exchange review through Whova: https://whova.com/portal/webapp/conne_202201/Agenda/2108261
